alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:28PM CST until February 26 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .Heavy rainfall that occurred Thursday continues to cause rises on the Big Muddy River. The river is forecast to go above flood stage at Murphysboro on Monday. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some minor flooding in S 3rd & Division / Plum Street area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday morning to a crest of 23.5 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
